title: ZMPSIISA Women's Summer Off The Shoulder Maxi Dress Ruffle Strapless Blue White Porcelain Boho Casual Loose Long Dresses
description: 95% rayon + 5% spandex. These off shoulder maxi sundresses are made of brand new and high-quality fabric. soft, lightweight, comfy, unstretchy and breathable. A perfect sun dress for spring, summer and fall.

The perfect casual summertime essential! The boho maxi long dress features beautiful layered design, strapless ruffle bust, vintage floral print, cold shoulder, elastic waist, ankle length. Put it on to attain a cool summer.
The plus size tube top sundress is designed with loose style that hide belly fat. Not only a perfect maternity dress for photoshoot but also a perfect body shaper for curvy women.

The bohemian floral dress is perfect for summer hawaiian beach dates, vacations, parties, weddings, clubs, and daily wear, even for easter and other special occasions. This dress makes you look like a supermodel, easily catching others' eyes.

The boho dress is flowy, lightweight, cool and not see-through, it flows like the wind when walking, super comfy and flattering. Perfect pair with sunglasses, jewelry, cute sandals for a cool summer look! An essential summer-long dress in your wardrobe.
